title: Alternative Investments and Wealth Strategies
description: A comprehensive exploration of alternative investment options beyond traditional stocks and bonds, including real estate, REITs, commodities, precious metals, cryptocurrency, and private equity, with analysis of correlation benefits, liquidity considerations, and valuation challenges.
learning_objectives: Analyze the characteristics and benefits of alternative asset classes for portfolio diversification
Evaluate the role of real estate investing in long-term wealth building strategies
Compare liquidity, risk, and return profiles of commodities, precious metals, and cryptocurrency
Assess how alternative investments provide correlation benefits and inflation protection
Make informed decisions about incorporating alternative investments into personal financial plans

skill_builder.title: Alternative Investment Portfolio Analyzer
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students explore how alternative investments (real estate, commodities, precious metals, cryptocurrency) affect portfolio diversification, correlation, and risk-adjusted returns.
